messages.body: $AAPL futures are up, can Monday repeat? $SPY $BAC $MCD Pre-ER running to Corporations TaxCut phase 2... No broken fundamentals... BUY
$SPY 2 days to go for quarter close + long weekend and we are right at the point of testing 200ma.. how low can this go $AAPL $AMZN $VIX
$SPY Even as Bulls or Bears we have to admit this Market needs some sanity. The machines are in control & something is off $BABA $AAPL $JPM
$AAPL imagine - Trump the political neophyte with all his short comings is the one who denuclearizes North Korea and saves the world
@ABTOPuTET @JohnyB5000 like it or not, companies trade wildly on any news related to $AAPL look at $WATT or $SWKS
$AAPL  Trump is winning Twitter strategy!
$AAPL Nikki and China already 1% up
$AAPL  Fasten your seat belts tomorrow
$AAPL yuuuuuge
